summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 INFINITI QX60. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE REAR DRIVER'S SIDE LAP SEAT BELT SCREW, WHICH WAS MOUNTED TO THE DOOR, DETACHED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER, WHO STATED THE SUPPORT SCREW WAS NOT SECURELY INSTALLED DURING PRODUCTION. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE AND VIN WERE UNAVAILABLE.   UPDATED 6/24/15*CN
